婾字的基本解释

婾
tōu
同“媮”。

婾
yú
同“媮”。

婾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tōu］
“媮1”的旧字形。
[②]［yú］
“媮2”的旧字形。

婾字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　婾； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第08
【廣韻】羊朱切【集韻】【韻會】容朱切，?音兪。【說文】薄也。一曰靡也。【楚辭·卜居】將從俗富貴以婾生乎。【左傳·襄三十年】晉未可婾也。　又樂也。與愉通。【呂氏春秋】齊威王鼓瑟。騶忌子曰：攫而深，醇而婾者，政令也。　又叶餘昭切，音遙。【韋孟·諷諫詩】務彼鳥獸，忽此稼苗。烝民以匱，我王以婾。　又【廣韻】託侯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】他侯切，?音偸。【晉語】婾居幸生。【賈山至言】婾合取容。　又巧黠也。【左傳·文十八年】齊君之語婾。

婾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
婾字的起名意思

暂无。

Concubine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　婾; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 266 08
[Guang Yun] Sheep Zhu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Rong Zhu cut,? Yin 兪. [Said Wen] Bo Ye. One said to be extravagant. [Songs of the Chu·Buju] From the vulgar to the rich and noble, you will be born as a concubine. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Thirty Years] Jin was not a concubine.　It's fun again. With Yutong. 【Lu Shi Chun Qiu】The King of Qi Wei is singing and singing. Wu Jizi said: Grab and deep, mellow and concubine, and decree.　Ye Yu Zhao cut again, Yin Yao. [Wei Meng·Illustration Poems] Take care of the birds and beasts, and suddenly crop seedlings. If the people are short, we are the king.　[Guang Yun] To Hou Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] He Hou Qi,? Yin 偸. 【Jin Chinese】Successful living in a concubine. [Jia Shanzhiyan] Concubine together to take content.　What a coincidence. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteenth Year of Wen] Qi Jun's words and concubines.
